pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Analysis of High Dimensional Data // A collection of methods for the robust analysis of univariate and multivariate functional data, possibly in high-dimensional cases, and hence with attention to computational efficiency and simplicity of use. See the R Journal publication of Ieva et al. (2019) doi:10.32614/RJ-2019-032 for an in-depth presentation of the 'roahd' package. See Aleman-Gomez et al. (2021) arXiv:2103.08874 for details about the concept of depthgram.
